thread.title: Alabama OL lands offer from Tennessee
thread.title_full: Alabama OL lands offer from Tennessee

title: Alabama OL lands offer from Tennessee

organizations.name: pierce quick of hewitt-trussville high school

text:
Alabama OL lands offer from Tennessee A Class of 2019 offensive lineman from Alabama received an early scholarship offer Tuesday from Tennessee. Slot to Tennessee Links (Photo: Twitter: @PierceQuick ) 
Sophomore offensive lineman Pierce Quick of Hewitt-Trussville High School in Trussville, Ala., posted on his Twitter account Tuesday afternoon that he received a scholarship offer from Tennessee. 
" Blessed to receive an offer from Tennessee #VFL #SEC," he tweeted. (What's next for the Vols? Make sure you're in the loop — take five seconds to sign up for our FREE Vols newsletter now!) 
The 6-foot-5, 270-pound Quick also holds early offers from Auburn, Memphis, UAB and Jacksonville State. He's expected to be one of the top offensive linemen from Alabama in the 2019 class. 
Both predictions on the 247Sports Crystal Ball point to Alabama as the early favorite to land him. 
Blessed to receive an offer from Tennessee #VFL #SEC pic.twitter.com/wIFoH8iVk3 — Pierce Quick (@PierceQuick) February 21, 2017 Get VIP access to GoVols247 with a FREE 7-DAY TRIAL . Author
